A lot of this is courtesy of Apres Hill's blog 

https://www.apreshill.com/blog/2020-12-new-year-new-blogdown/#step-1-create-repo

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
oplot <- ggplot(Orange, aes(x = age, 
                   y = circumference, 
                   colour = Tree)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  guides(colour = FALSE) +
  theme_bw()
oplot
```
